name: Zentaoinfo
body:
### Welcome to ZentaoInfo Pages.
This plugin is the easiest way to share your idea and your opinion with your team on Zentao PMS.

### How to use?
You hava two ways:  
When you have login in to Zenmtao PMS , make sure you have the permision to administrate the extension.  
1.

```
1.Admin->Extension->Obtain  
2.Select Info Plugin and Install it.
```

2.

```
1.Download this plugin on this site then change it name to correct.
Or download thie plugin on the Official Website. 
2.Admin->Extension->Upload and install.  
```

[Official Website](http://www.zentao.net/extension-viewExt-16-release-front.html "ZentaoInfo")  

### Authors and Contributors
In 2011, Yanzhi Wang(@ct455332) founded zentaoinfo.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this plugin? Check out the documentation at [Here](http://www.zentao.net/extension-viewExt-16.html "ZentaoInfo")  or contact yzwang.nj@foxmail.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
tagline: A simple extension which has basic info module and so on.
